texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Information about our quarterly meetings with taxi trade representatives."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
We hold quarterly meetings with taxi trade representatives on issues relating to licensing, compliance and enforcement. The actions of those meetings are available to read in the following documents:
